source.sqlReaderQuery:
-- Langkah 1: Pilih entri terbaru untuk setiap EmployeeID
WITH LatestEmployeeLog AS (
    SELECT 
        EmployeeID,
        Name,
        Position,
        StartDate,
        EndDate,
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY EmployeeID ORDER BY EndDate DESC) AS rn
    FROM EmployeeLog
)

-- Langkah 2: Perbarui tabel user dengan data terbaru dari LatestEmployeeLog
UPDATE user
SET 
    user.Name = lel.Name,
    user.Position = lel.Position,
    user.StartDate = lel.StartDate,
    user.EndDate = lel.EndDate
FROM 
    LatestEmployeeLog lel
WHERE 
    lel.rn = 1
    AND user.EmployeeID = lel.EmployeeID;
